definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: The students were distributed into four ranks.
sentences.chinese: 學生們被分成四列橫隊。

sentences.english: On the word of command, the company formed smartly into three ranks.
sentences.chinese: 一聲令下，全連戰士迅速排成三列橫隊。

sentences.english: The soldiers were distributed into five ranks.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們分成爲五列橫隊。

sentences.english: The soldiers formed into three ranks.
The left wing,having deployed into line,began to advance.
sentences.chinese: 左翼部隊以疏散開的橫隊向前推進。

sentences.english: The students form is two ranks.
sentences.chinese: 學生們站成了兩列橫隊。
